channel.title: Blood Runes vs. Ecto Tokens
channel.description:
How come when I use Ecto-Tokens instead of BloodRunes, my spells that require Bloods suddenly work? When I use the regular blood rune it doesn't work?
I need an answer, there is no logical reason for this!

item.title: Blood Runes vs. Ecto Tokens
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Yeah, you mean when I cast a spell?

if (spellID == 1183) { // Wind wave
if (playerLevel[6] >= 62) {
if ((playerHasItemAmount(565, 1) == false)
|| (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5) == false)) {
sendMessage(
“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
} else if ((playerHasItemAmount(565, 1) == true)
&& (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5) == true)) {
setAnimation(711);
ProjectileSpellPlayer(158, 159, 160, absY, absX, offsetY,
offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 62);
hitDiff = misc.random(16);
gfx110(158);
castOnPlayer.hitDiff = hitDiff;
castOnPlayer.KillerId = playerId;
castOnPlayer.updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true;
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 5);
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 1);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a magic lvl of 62 for this spell !”);
}
}

The spell only casts when I have ectos instead blood runes, but when I use bloods it doesn’t work. It’s F’ing with my mind.

Read full topic
